attributes.value: Values family
Finds maintaining decorum a silly, fumbling waste of time
Disregards tradition
Is greatly disturbed by quiet and a peaceful existence
Values leisure time
Is given to rough-and-tumble brawling, even to the point of starting fights for no reason
Doesn't stick with things if even minor difficulties arise
Tends to be a little wasteful when working on projects
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Is quite comfortable with others that have a different appearance or culture
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Finds helping others emotionally rewarding
Dislikes obligations and will try to avoid being bound by them
Tries to keep her things orderly
Is trusting
Would never under any circumstances speak up or otherwise put forth her point of view in a discussion
Likes a little excitement now and then
Has a tendency to consider ideas and abstractions over practical applications
Weak
Little willpower
